# cloudflare_workers_cron_trigger (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_workers_cron_trigger" "example_workers_cron_trigger" {
  account_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
  script_name = "this-is_my_script-01"
}
```
